paper.title: Towards value orientated core competence choosing and forming a portfolio decision analysis tool
paper.abstract: The article analyzes the current oil the investment decision and the characteristics of the core competence, and shows that corporation applied decision methods exist limits. Based on the merit and the problem with the investment decision methods, we choose and form a portfolio decision analysis tool to value the investment of core competencies. Real option and game theory is used to identify and value growth opportunities of core competencies. Decision tree is to analyze the internal risk factors and choose the item in which a firm has ability to get the objective. DCF (discounted cash flows) call help real option and decision-tree to analyze the expected cash flows. Our proposed a portfolio decision analysis tools can help firm identify the strategic growth of core competencies and choice the item in which firm has the ability to realize the object and to lower the fault frank oil the investment decision.

domain_result.justification: 该论文主要讨论了如何选择和形成一种投资组合决策分析工具，用于评估核心竞争力的投资价值。虽然使用了决策树、实物期权和博弈论等方法，但这些技术的应用主要集中在投资组合的选择和优化上，属于投资组合管理的范畴。
